tool_description: Estimates maintenance costs including parts, labor, and taxes based on service types, location, and service provider preferences.

maintenance_services.description: List of maintenance services to estimate costs for

service_provider_type.description: Type of service provider (dealer, independent, chain)

tax_rate.description: Local tax rate as decimal (e.g., 0.0825 for 8.25%)

error_messages: Invalid vehicle year: Must be between 1980 and current year plus 2.
Invalid ZIP code: Must be a valid 5-digit US ZIP code.
Unsupported service provider type: Use one of [dealer, independent, chain].
Invalid parts preference: Use one of [oem, aftermarket, premium].
Invalid labor rate: Must be positive number if specified.
Invalid tax rate: Must be between 0 and 0.20 (0% to 20%).
Service not recognized: One or more maintenance services are not in the pricing database.
usage: Provide maintenance services list and vehicle details. The tool estimates total costs including regional variations and service provider differences.

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all services including tax

cost_breakdown.description: Cost breakdown in format 'category:amount' (parts, labor, tax)

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of estimates (high, medium, low)
